Myrkulite Scourge is one of the Flail Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Myrkulite Scourge is a magical flail that deals extra Necrotic damage on hit. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
